General.Name: Beijing Hanbang Technology Corp
General.Description: Beijing Hanbang Technology Corp. engages in the audio and video monitoring, intelligent security, and digital watermarking business in China. The company offers DVR and NVR products, HD-SDI cameras, IP cameras, infrared imaging cameras, and compression cards, as well as Internet application solutions. Beijing Hanbang Technology Corp. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
